itinerary.day1Overview: Morning meet with our representative and leave for Horsley Hills, one of the popular tourist destinations in Andhra Pradesh. Located at an altitude of 4100 meters, Horsley Hills offers a refreshing break amidst beautiful natural settings and a soothing environment. Upon arrival at the hill station, check into the resort surrounded by exotic flora and rich fauna. Enjoy leisure time and explore the surroundings. Overnight stay at the resort.

itinerary.day2Overview: Today will be at leisure to roam freely around this beautiful hill station. Take pleasant walks and enjoy the serene environment. For adventure seekers, indulge in various adventurous activities like trekking, hiking, and rappelling, which are popular among tourists here. Overnight stay at the resort.

itinerary.day3Overview:
After spending some morning hours at leisure, depart from Horsley Hills for Bangalore.

Tour & Services Ends.

overView.heading: Scenic Ooty: Queen of Hill Stations
overView.text: Escape the city's hustle and bustle for a refreshing weekend in the picturesque hill station of Ooty. Nestled in the Nilgiri Hills, this charming town offers breathtaking vistas, lush tea plantations, and serene lakes. Explore the famous Botanical Gardens, take a toy train ride, and indulge in the region's flavorful cuisine.

overView.heading: Mysore: Regal History and Opulence
overView.text: Embark on a weekend getaway to Mysore, a city steeped in royal grandeur and cultural heritage. Marvel at the stunning Mysore Palace, a testament to Indo-Saracenic architecture, and explore the vibrant Devaraja Market for unique handicrafts and spices. Immerse yourself in the city's rich legacy and savor the famous Mysore Pak.

overView.heading: Coorg: Nature's Enchanting Embrace
overView.text: Escape to the serene and lush landscapes of Coorg, also known as the 'Scotland of India.' This picturesque hill station offers a perfect blend of natural beauty, adventure, and cultural experiences. Indulge in coffee plantation tours, trek through misty hills, and witness the captivating Dubare Elephant Camp.

overView.heading: Hampi: Timeless Marvel of Vijayanagara
overView.text: Delve into the rich historical tapestry of Hampi, an UNESCO World Heritage Site and the former capital of the mighty Vijayanagara Empire. Explore the awe-inspiring ruins, including the iconic Virupaksha Temple, Elephant Stables, and the mesmerizing Vijayanagara Ruins, showcasing the grandeur of a bygone era.

overView.heading: Chikmagalur: Coffee Trails and Scenic Delights
overView.text: Discover the allure of Chikmagalur, a hill station renowned for its sprawling coffee plantations and breathtaking landscapes. Embark on a coffee plantation tour, witness the Mullayanagiri Peak, and unwind amidst the serene ambiance of this charming destination, famous for its aromatic coffee and natural beauty.

overView.heading: Gokarna: Coastal Tranquility
overView.text: Escape to the serene coastal town of Gokarna, a hidden gem along the Arabian Sea. Explore its pristine beaches, ancient temples, and the iconic Kudle Beach, famous for its laid-back vibe and water sports. Immerse yourself in the town's spiritual essence and enjoy the tranquil surroundings.

overView.heading: Nandi Hills: Serene Hilltop Retreat
overView.text: Experience the tranquility of Nandi Hills, a popular weekend getaway from Bangalore. Perched atop a picturesque hillock, this destination offers stunning panoramic views, ancient temples, and trekking trails. Enjoy the scenic beauty, explore the heritage sites, and savor the local delicacies amidst the serene surroundings.
